summary: During the final days at the Yankee Pedlar Inn, two employees determined to reveal the hotel's haunted past begin to experience disturbing events as old guests check in for a stay.
cast: Sara Paxton|Pat Healy|Alison Bartlett|Jake Ryan|Kelly McGillis|Lena Dunham|Brenda Cooney|George Riddle|John Speredakos|Sean Reid|Kurt Venghaus|Thomas Mahoney|Michael Martin|Michael P. Castelli
keywords: haunted hotel|psychotronic film|woman wrapped in a towel|hotel|inn
